data.title: Jack Dempsey on LinkedIn: Thanks so much Paul and David for inviting me to be on Local Government‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: Thanks so much Paul and David for inviting me to be on Local Government Mutual Services Risk Aware podcast!
data.text:
Episode 4 of Risk Aware has dropped! In this episode, Bundaberg Regional Council Mayor Jack Dempsey shares some incredible insights into the strategic elected member role and the importance of great practical risk and opportunity management, exploring big picture topics for local government including financial sustainability, housing affordability, economic development and environmental planning. To listen, head to this link: https://lnkd.in/ejDheMbY

Are you a natural risk taker, naturally cautious, or somewhere in between? Find out why this matters as we take a walk through the fascinating topic of "personal risk thresholds" on Episode 31! https://lnkd.in/ggwTU2p2

We're back again with another great interview in our 'Risk Insights' series! It's now available to watch exclusively on our YouTube channel >> https://lnkd.in/ewRP6Z9t In this edition, Grant Kennedy, MIRM, speaks to Matt Horox, to gain an insight into operational resilience. You can catch up on the full series here >> https://lnkd.in/eVbTE6dT #riskmanagement #riskinsights

Risk is something we encounter everyday. What does it mean? In this episode of Prudentips, we touch on the definition of risk. Watch to learn more. #Prudentips #PrudentialBankGh #TrulyDependable

Part 4 of our 2-minute video series for Boards on "Getting Risk RIght." This instalment looks at how risks should be captured in the board papers. #riskgovernance #riskandcompliance #boardeffectiveness

üåü Everything great was born out of some form of risk, but when does it become too risky to engage in any form of risk? ü§î On this episode of Insights with Ky, we tackle 'The Thin Line Between Risk & Greed' to help you differentiate between both. üöÄ Join the conversation and gain valuable insights! üéôÔ∏è‚ú® Click the link below to access full video; https://lnkd.in/e3K6JXtr #InsightsWithKy #RiskAndGreed #WisdomJourney"

The risk landscape is rapidly evolving, and wealth managers are seeking out new solutions to measure and manage risk for their clients‚Äô investment portfolios. This area of financial planning goes well beyond a risk tolerance number, but, is technology keeping up? Listen in on this WealthStack podcast episode where Shannon Rosic chats to risk management expert Rick Bookstaber and Fabric CEO, Govinda Quish about this! >> http://spr.ly/6047Pdfmh #WealthStack #technology #risk #wealth

Dr. Gav Schneider joins RIMScast to discuss ‚Äúwicked problems,‚Äù problems that are fast evolving with no clear solution or where the solution generates further problems and a level of residual risk that is potentially worse than the initial issue itself. The episode explores how risk managers can better cope with and wrangle wicked problems to create successful outcomes. Download the episode: https://bit.ly/3R55omk
